Snacks.name: Crispy Paneer Burger
Snacks.info: A delicious vegetarian burger made with a grilled paneer patty, fresh lettuce, tomato, onions, and a flavorful sauce, all sandwiched between a soft, toasted bun.

Snacks.name: Garden Fresh Veggies Focaccia Sandwitch
Snacks.info: A wholesome sandwich made with a variety of fresh vegetables like cucumber, tomato, lettuce, and cheese, layered between two slices of whole-grain or white bread.

Snacks.name: Large Nachos Combo
Snacks.info: Crispy tortilla chips topped with melted cheese, jalapeños and sour cream.

Snacks.name: Large Nachos With Cheese & Salsa Dip
Snacks.info: Crispy tortilla chips topped with melted cheese, jalapeños, sour cream, and salsa.

Snacks.name: Paneer Tikka Sandwitch
Snacks.info: A flavorful sandwich made with marinated and grilled paneer tikka pieces, fresh vegetables like onions, tomatoes, and lettuce, all tucked between soft bread slices.

Snacks.name: Veggie Mint Chutney Burger
Snacks.info: A delicious veggie burger made with a spiced patty of mashed vegetables, topped with a cooling mint chutney, fresh lettuce, and tomato, all sandwiched in a soft bun.
